remarks: The principal Dirichlet character is a real character.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)
statement:
dchr1re.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchr1re.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchr1re.o $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchr1re.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Z ) $.
dchr1re.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dchr1re $p |- ( ph -> .1. : B --> RR ) $.
